name: StarCrawlers
blurb: Lead a crew of freelance adventurers & navigate corporate intrigue on the fringes of space in a classic sci-fi dungeon crawl

rewards.reward: No Reward

TIPSTER                                                        
==============================            Our sincere thanks, good karma, and an acknowledgment in the credits plus:
==============================  
StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

SAVVY
==============================
The complete game at an early adopter price and a special mention of your name in the credits
==============================
1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

STARCRAWLER\r\n==============================\r\nThe complete game and a special mention of your name in the credits ============================== 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

ROCKSTARCRAWLER
============================== 
Get the game and rock out to the tunes of StarCrawlers by Ben Prunty!
============================== 
1 Digital soundtrack download + 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

RECON SPECIALIST\r\n==============================\r\nAccess to the Beta at a reduced price! Influence the direction of the game from Beta and beyond with early access to the game and the Beta-only forum. You'll also receive a special in-game thank you ============================== Beta access + special in-game thank you + 1 Digital soundtrack download + 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

RECON
==============================
Access to the Beta, the Beta-only forum and a special in-game thank you
============================== Beta access + special in-game thank you + 1 Digital soundtrack download + 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

RECON ELITE ============================== Access to the Alpha! Influence the direction of the game from Alpha and beyond with early access to the game and the exclusive Alpha-only forum. ============================== Alpha/Beta access + special in-game thank you + 1 Digital soundtrack download + 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

RECON PLATINUM ELITE PLUS ============================== Access to the Pre-Alpha - get your hands on StarCrawlers before anyone else! Influence the direction of the game from Pre-Alpha and beyond with the earliest access to the game and the exclusive Pre-Alpha-only forum. You'll also get the name of your choice on a random NPC (keep it classy!) AND you get the Digital StarCrawlers art book ============================== Pre-Alpha/Alpha/Beta access + 1 name on an NPC + special in-game thank you + 1 Digital StarCrawlers art book + 1 Digital soundtrack download + 1 DRM free copy of StarCrawlers (PC / Mac / Linux - or 1 Steam key, if possible) + in-game Backer Bundle rewards + StarCrawlers HD Wallpapers + Social Media icon pack

LET'S GET PHYSICAL\r\n==============================\r\nFor the loot lover, get ALL of the above plus the exclusive StarCrawlers Tee! ============================== 1 StarCrawlers Tee (male or female sizes available) + everything from the previous tier

ROBOTICS ENGINEER\r\n=============================\r\nWork with us directly to create a custom skin for an enemy robot and receive a signed digital pic of your enemy ============================== Design 1 enemy robot skin + signed digital pic of your enemy + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

ITEM FABRICATOR\r\n==============================\r\nWork with us directly to design a legendary loot drop (weapon, armor, shield or accessory - YOU CHOOSE) You can also opt to display your name as the manufacturer! ============================== Design and name 1 Legendary item + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

GET IN THE GAME\r\n============================= \r\nBecome immortal (digitally)! Asa will design an NPC based on your name and likeness that will appear in random events, quests and encounters! You'll also receive a signed digital pic of your NPC bust ============================== Your name and likeness as an NPC + signed digital pic of your NPC + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

GET IN THE GAME II ============================= Become immortal (digitally)! Asa will design an NPC based on your name and likeness that will appear in random events, quests and encounters! You'll also receive a signed digital pic of your NPC bust ============================== Your name and likeness as an NPC + signed digital pic of your NPC + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

OK, YOU'RE THE BOSS ============================= Make your dreams of being a corporate overlord a reality! Work with us directly to create a corporation, its business type and backstory, logo and even name its CEO (that could be YOU!). Your corp will be featured in the game as a mission creator for Crawlers! ============================== Create a corporation, corp logo, and name it's CEO + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

STARCROSSED LOVER ============================= You'll receive 1 of only 21 custom, hand-made Knit Plop snuggle buddies! ============================== 1 hand-made Knit Plop + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE\r\n==============================\r\nCreate an encounter for your NPC! Asa will design an NPC based on your name and likeness AND you'll work directly with us to create a random encounter featuring your NPC! You'll also get a signed digital copy of the NPC portrait and your name featured in the designer credits ============================== Design a random encounter featuring your name and likeness as an NPC + signed digital pic of your NPC + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE II ============================== Create an encounter for your NPC! Asa will design an NPC based on your name and likeness AND you'll work directly with us to create a random encounter featuring your NPC! You'll also get a signed digital copy of the NPC portrait and your name featured in the designer credits ============================== Design a random encounter featuring your name and likeness as an NPC + signed digital pic of your NPC + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

CHIEF ROBOTICS ENGINEER\r\n=============================\r\nBuild a bot! Work with us directly to create a unique enemy robot (including their look, animations and abilities!) and and receive a signed digital pic of the enemy you designed ============================== Design 1 enemy robot + signed digital pic of your enemy + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

MISSION FABRICATOR\r\n==============================\r\nDesign a mission! Asa will design an NPC based on your name and likeness AND you'll work directly with us to create an entire mission from start to finish - including loot! You'll also receive a signed hand drawn original sketch of your NPC ============================== Design a mission & rewards + your name and likeness as an NPC + signed hand drawn original sketch of your NPC + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier

COLLECTORS EDITION
==============================
Score 1 of 10 limited edition hardbound StarCrawlers art books and leave your mark on the game by getting everything in BOTH the CHIEF ROBOTICS ENGINEER tier and the MISSION FABRICATOR tier - both your enemy robot and NPC will be immortalized forever in a framed and signed art print
============================== 1 Limited edition hardcover StarCrawlers art book + Design a mission & rewards + Design 1 enemy robot + your name and likeness as an NPC + framed & signed hand drawn original sketch of your NPC & enemy robot + everything from the LET'S GET PHYSICAL tier
